mapper.select: SELECT C.CINEMA_INDEX,C.CINEMA_TITLE,COUNT(B.COUNT) AS MOVIE_COUNT,D.LOCAL_CLASS FROM CINEMA_THEATER A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT THEATER_INDEX, COUNT(SHOWING_INDEX) AS COUNT FROM MOVIE_SHOWING WHERE MOVIE_INDEX = #{value} AND SHOW_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY THEATER_INDEX) B ON A.THEATER_INDEX = B.THEATER_INDEX INNER JOIN CINEMA C ON A.CINEMA_INDEX = C.CINEMA_INDEX INNER JOIN CATEGORY_LOCAL D ON C.LOCAL_INDEX = D.LOCAL_INDEX GROUP BY C.CINEMA_TITLE,C.CINEMA_INDEX ORDER BY C.LOCAL_INDEX,C.CINEMA_TITLE
SELECT A.CINEMA_INDEX,A.CINEMA_TITLE,B.LOCAL_NAME,B.LOCAL_CLASS FROM CINEMA A INNER JOIN CATEGORY_LOCAL B ON A.LOCAL_INDEX = B.LOCAL_INDEX
